name: Magical Destroyer: Outbreak
description:
Everyone turns into a zombie in a school with the exception of Sakura. Sakura is the leader of the martial arts club in the school. However, not only she has to survive. She now has to put an end to what started the zombie outbreak.

-Music: Andy Ray
-Scripts: Osarion, DenomRS
-Voices: CrossPhase Inc.
-Models: ALIyerEdon, Mundus, DenomRS
-Animations: Osarion, Explosive, Mixamo
